Locates any {{Flag|SHOOTABLE}} actors touching the calling actor. Deals 10001 points of damage to tho..."
revision.text:
{{codepointer|r=Hexen}} '''A_ThrustImpale'''
(''no parameter'')
Locates any {{Flag|SHOOTABLE}} actors touching the calling actor. Deals 10001 points of damage to those actors and then sets the second argument (bloody) to 1. This codepointer is restricted to {{Class|ThrustFloor}} and derived classes.
